intervention_catalogue.name: Pathways to Change
intervention_catalogue.short_description: The toolkit for Women convicted of sexual offences
intervention_catalogue.long_description: The toolkit was created to fill the existing gap in provision for work with Women convicted of sexual offences. It is gender specific and trauma-informed, underpinned by strengths based approaches and Bio-psycho-social model, and is designed to be delivered flexibly to best address the needs of the woman on probation.
